title: Formula for Gravitational Force
text: The acceleration due to gravity g at the surface of the Mars is given by the equation:g $$=$$ \frac{G \cdot M}{r**2}.

title: Plug in the Values
text: As we know the mass of Mars is $$6.418\times{10}^{23} kg$$ and its radius is $$3.38\times{10}^6 m$$, what is g after we substitute those values into the formula?
